model_answer: The visual shown on the slide at 00:00:49.782-00:01:17.521 is option A: A side-by-side comparison showing an average Moon next to a larger-looking supermoon on a white slide.

Option A is the correct statement made by the speaker at the mentioned time interval. The speaker explains how due to the moon's rotation and orbit around the Earth, we can observe only about 59% of its surface from our viewpoint on Earth. The remaining 41% remains unobservable except through spacecraft.
